Description: Code linking to SUEWS_SiteSelect.txt for snow surfaces (SnowCode). Value of integer is arbitrary but must match code specified in SUEWS_SiteSelect.txt.
"Multiplier for each hour of the day [-] for energy and water use. For SnowClearing
column5: set those hours to 1 when snow removal from paved and roof surface is allowed (0 otherwise) if the snow removal limits set in the SUEWS_Non Veg.txt (SnowLimR emove column) are exceeded."
